# Data Setup/Cleaning

```{r}
library(survival)
library(dplyr)
survival_data_csv <- read.csv("./Breast_Cancer.csv")
survival_time_desc <- survival_data_csv %>%
  arrange(Survival.Months) %>%
  mutate(Status = ifelse(Status == "Alive", 1, 0),
         Grade = ifelse(Grade == " anaplastic; Grade IV", "4", Grade))

survival_time_desc

# Checking for abnormal values
lapply(survival_time_desc, unique)
# sum(is.na(survival_time_desc)) no NA values
```
